name: INDeleteTasksIntentHandling
desc: An interface that handles requests to delete tasks from a task list.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: func resolveTaskList(for: INDeleteTasksIntent, with: (INDeleteTasksTaskListResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the task list from which to delete tasks.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INDeleteTasksIntent, completion: (INDeleteTasksIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Validates whether you can delete the task.
